title: Girls Fleece Lined Quilted Midlength Winter Puffer Jacket Zip-Off Sherpa Hood
features: Fine insulated wind and water resistant polyester composition guarantees its quality and durability
Thick down alternative filling; comfy sherpa lined zip-off detachable hood with faux fur trim
Cozy fleece lined body, sherpa neck, along with interior fleece cuffs ensures your child will stay warm
Detailed fashionable stylish and neat classic quilted design; Elasticized back provides comfortable snug fit coat; Front pockets
Perfect for everyday school wear; Easy Care: machine wash cold, gentle cycle
SIZE and FIT: For best fit, please refer to size chart among product photos
description: At Sportoli®, we keep the active people in mind. Our products are constructed of the most durable materials to create convenient everyday items and withstand the heaviest of sport and activity. Our affordable prices allow all people at all budgets to benefit of great products.

An ultimate blend of tastiness and style. This girl’s puffer jacket coat by Sportoli features stylish and dressy detailing. It offers a hefty layer of down alternative filling alongside a cozy fleece body lining. Its zip-off detachable hood features a comfy Sherpa lining and is trimmed with fine faux fur. Check out the product images for more product details and detailed size chart for your best fit. Available in sizes 4 to 16 and in a variety of colors to best meet your taste and your child's appearance.

Our coats are easy to wash: just throw them into the washer with cold water, gentle cycle; zip-off the hood before putting the coat in dryer. Dry low. Hang the hood to dry. Check the care instructions on the label inside the coat for more details.
Looking for another color or something else? Shop Amazon's Sportoli Store for some more beautiful quality outerwear and winter accessories for your darling.
